PrescribingInteractionClass.name: Acetazolamide
PrescribingInteractionClass.description: A carbonic anhydrase inhibitor with weak diuretic activity.

Interaction.Abbreviated: Acetazolamide may reduce the glomerular filtration rate, and is associated with acidosis in renal impairment. Contraindicated in severe renal impairment.
Interaction.Professional: Acetazolamide may reduce the glomerular filtration rate, and is associated with acidosis in renal impairment. Contraindicated in severe renal impairment.
